UpdateFromString
GetByFilter
Method.Implementation:
set id = ""
&sql(SELECT person.ID INTO :id FROM Dance_Data.PersonUDSR as person INNER JOIN Dance_Data_Localization.LTextValue as ltvalLN ON ltvalLN.LText = person.LastName INNER JOIN Dance_Data_Localization.LTextValue as ltvalFN ON ltvalFN.LText = person.FirstName WHERE %UPPER(ltvalLN.Value) = %UPPER(TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM :filter.lastName)) AND %UPPER(ltvalFN.Value) = %UPPER(TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM :filter.firstName)) AND (DATEPART('YEAR', person.DOB) || '-' || DATEPART('MONTH', person.DOB) || '-' || DATEPART('DAY', person.DOB) = :filter.dob OR DATEDIFF(YEAR, person.DOB, NOW()) = :filter.age OR %UPPER(person.City) = %UPPER(TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM :filter.city)) OR %UPPER(person.Club) = %UPPER(TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM :filter.club))))
quit ..%OpenId(id)
